danger-zone.blocking-organizations-help: You must remove yourself, transfer ownership, or delete this organization before you can delete your user.
danger-zone.blocking-organizations_one: Your account is currently an owner in this organization: <1>{{organizations}}</1>.
danger-zone.blocking-organizations_other: Your account is currently an owner in these organizations: <1>{{organizations}}</1>.
danger-zone.delete-description: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
danger-zone.dialog-description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
danger-zone.implicitly-deleted-organizations_one: The following organization will be deleted: <1>{{organizations}}</1>
danger-zone.implicitly-deleted-organizations_other: The following organizations will be deleted: <1>{{organizations}}</1>
danger-zone.title: Danger Zone

form.avatar-description: Your avatar will be shown across the application.
form.avatar-max-file-size: Image size must be less than 1MB
form.email-description: Your email address is used to identify you and cannot be changed.
form.name-description: Your name will be shown in all organizations across the application.
form.name-max-length: Your name must be at most 128 characters long.
form.name-min-length: Your name must be at least 2 characters long.
form.name-must-be-string: Your name must be a string.
